channel.title: [RELEASE] New RuneScape HD Dragon Platebody[RELEASE]
channel.description:
Hello. This all just for YOU!:D
Download: [url=http://uppit.com/v/XQJYJL95]http://uppit.com/v/XQJYJL95[/url]
Pictures: Inventory: [IMG]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/dragonplateinv.jpg[/img]
Look: [IMG]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/Dragonplatelook.jpg[/img]
Now open your client's class8.java and add this code [code]if(i == 10019) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925; class8.anInt174 = 14104; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14105;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14105;//female wearing class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon platebody";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Provides excellent protection".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
Now to get it to platebody position do this:
Open your server's folder and find item.java then search [code]plate[/code] and :[code]platebody[/code] Add your dragon platebody's item ids to it=)
Please post replys. :D

item.title: [RELEASE] New RuneScape HD Dragon Platebody[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Lol, that’s mine, i can tell by the ints and drop models, and, the main thing, back then i could not manually animate, therefore i stole the already animated 317 arms instead of using the correct 508 ones.

Us people at Moparscape dislike leechers. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.description:

Wow, this has only been done MANY times before, SilentCJ already has REAL rs’s platebody correctly animated.

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] New RuneScape HD Dragon Platebody[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

Hello. This all just for YOU!

Download: http://uppit.com/v/XQJYJL95

Pictures:
Inventory:

Look:

Now open your client’s class8.java and add this code

if(i == 10019) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925; class8.anInt174 = 14104; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14105;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14105;//female wearing class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon platebody";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Provides excellent protection".getBytes();//examin info }

Now to get it to platebody position do this:

Open your server’s folder and find item.java then search plate
and :platebody Add your dragon platebody’s item ids to it=)

Please post replys.

Read full topic
